pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Set of Tools that Enhance Reproducibility Beyond Package Management // Collection of high-level, robust, machine- and OS-independent tools for making deeply reproducible and reusable content in R. This includes light weight package management (similar to 'packrat' and 'checkpoint', but more flexible, lightweight, simpler and less tested than both), tools for caching, downloading and verifying or writing checksums, post-processing of common spatial datasets, and accessing GitHub repositories. Some features are still under active development.
